query: Get an ordered list of the latest top tech trends from the World Economic forum. Show the output in the format: <output>trend priority. name of the trend</output>. Do not display any other characters in the response, not even citations.

trends.name: Digital solutions and AI in healthcare scaling
Innovation and technology deployment at scale
AI for structural integrity in energy transition
Banks and blockchain integration in finance
AI supercycle with power and connectivity
